isValidBlock

public static boolean isValidBlock(char[] chars,
                                   int count)
Return true if the given character block is probably plaintext. As a rough start we are defining plaintext as a block of characters containing less than 1% invalid characters, and we'll see how that goes.

Parameters:
chars - characters to test for validity
